title: TypeError: Type torch.sparse.LongTensor doesn't implement stateless method cat
body_html:
a = torch.sparse.LongTensor(torch.Size([2,3]))
b = torch.sparse.LongTensor(torch.Size([2,3]))
torch.sparse.torch.cat((a, b))

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-54-10a82d668fd1> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.sparse.torch.cat(a, b)

TypeError: Type torch.sparse.LongTensor doesn't implement stateless method cat

Is it correct behaviour?
